Package terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators

Interface Summary
ActuationTarget This interface serves as a target for input actuation events.
PseudoActuator An interface that mimics those of an Actuator.
 

Class Summary
ActuationSplitter Splits (multicasts) the source event to multiple event targets.
Actuator A class that controls an attached target node through an actuation value.
ActuatorPlugin An abstract base class for actuator personality plugins.
AxisAnglePlugin An geometry plugin that performs geometric rotation.
GroupChain An abstract class that encapsulates one or more Groups arranged parent-to-child as a Group to provide more complex and constrained geometric manipulation (e.g.
MMTransformGroupPlugin (Multi-user Matrix TransformGroupPlugin) A transform group actuator plugin that assumes non-exclusive control of the target node and that the actuation state must be maintained by a matrix (Transform3D).
NegTranslationPlugin An translation plugin that performs negative translation.
RotationPlugin A geometry plugin that performs geometric rotation.
ScalePlugin A geometry plugin that performs geometric scaling.
SMTransformGroupPlugin (Sigle-user Matrix TransformGroupPlugin) A transform group actuator plugin that assumes exclusive control of the target node and that the actuation state must be maintained by a matrix (Transform3D).
SVTransformGroupPlugin (Single-user Vector TransformGroupPlugin) A transform group actuator plugin that assumes exclusive controls of its target node that the actuation state can be maintained by a vector (Vector4d).
TGGeometryPlugin An abstract base class for personality plugins used by TransformGroupPlugins to define the transform geometry.
TransformChain A group chain consisting of TransformGroup elements.
TransformGroupPlugin Abstract base class for an actuator plugin that manipulates a TransformGroup target node.
TranslationPlugin A geometry plugin that performs geometric translation.
